en.today: You'll need to temporarily put fun to the side, darling Aries, as the moon enters serious Capricorn. Forming difficult squares with Saturn and Neptune, you'll be reminded of how much responsibilities grow while dreams are chased. Though you may feel worn down or tested at times, now is your chance to prove to yourself and the divine that you're willing to work hard for the success and prosperity you seek. A flood of emotions could cause frustrations to boil over when Luna opposes Jupiter midafternoon, and it may be necessary to pull back for a bit to find rest and stillness.

en.today: Prioritize order as the moon drifts into Capricorn, dear Leo, aligning with Saturn and Neptune. Your dreams will begin to take shape, but it'll be essential to go through and iron out small details. A strong work ethic will be necessary as you proceed with the mundane side of manifesting your visions. Stick to business while maintaining organization, staying fueled adequately along the way. Ensure that you will have enough energy to see big goals through by tending to your body's needs. New ideas filter through when Jupiter stirs later this afternoon, helping you expand upon your agenda.

kh.today: ផ្តល់អាទិភាពដល់ការបញ្ជាទិញនៅពេលដែលព្រះចន្ទរសាត់ទៅក្នុង capricorn, Leo ជាទីស្រឡាញ់, តម្រឹមជាមួយសៅរ៍និង Neptune ។ក្តីសុបិន្តរបស់អ្នកនឹងចាប់ផ្តើមមានរាងស្អាតប៉ុន្តែវាចាំបាច់ក្នុងការឆ្លងកាត់និងមិនចេញព័ត៌មានលម្អិតតូចតាច។ក្រមសីលធម៌ការងារដ៏រឹងមាំមួយនឹងចាំបាច់នៅពេលអ្នកបន្តទៅមុខទៀតជាមួយនឹងផ្នែក Mundane នៃការបង្ហាញចក្ខុវិស័យរបស់អ្នក។ប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអាជីវកម្មខណៈពេលដែលរក្សាអង្គការរក្សាបានកម្លាំងពលកម្មឱ្យបានគ្រប់គ្រាន់នៅតាមផ្លូវ។ធានាថាអ្នកនឹងមានថាមពលគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការមើលឃើញគោលដៅធំតាមរយៈការគិតពីតម្រូវការរបស់រាងកាយអ្នក។តម្រងគំនិតថ្មីៗតាមរយៈនៅពេលដែល Jupiter Stirs ក្រោយមករសៀលនេះដែលបានជួយអ្នកពង្រីករបៀបវារៈរបស់អ្នក។

en.today: Be mindful of where you funnel your time, focus, and energy, dear Taurus. As the moon enters Capricorn and the sector of your chart that governs growth, expansion will occur quickly. What you put into the universe will multiply under this cosmic climate, so be sure to focus on positive goals and long-term goals. Remove yourself from potential distractions while Luna squares Saturn and Neptune, encouraging you to work from behind the scenes for now. Resurface to have meaningful conversations that can improve your prospects or trigger opportunities when Luna faces off with Jupiter later this afternoon.

en.today: You'll be in the mood to cultivate true intimacy, dear Gemini, as the moon drifts into Capricorn and your solar eighth house. However, be mindful of who you share vulnerabilities with while Luna squares Saturn and Neptune, especially when dealing with new friends. Pace yourself when defining fresh connections, even if your interactions feel intense and emotionally charged. Focus on building up your sense of power as the hours pass, recognizing that strength must be nurtured from within. Avoid overspending later this afternoon when Luna opposes Jupiter, especially if you're struggling to pay off existing debts.
